greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Form a permutation of the positive integers, p_1, p_2, ..., such that the average of each initial segment is an integer, using the greedy algorithm to define p_n; sequence gives p_1+..+p_n.
comment: It appears that a(n) is divisible by n. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 29 2004
link: Problem of the week, Web site - problem 818
formula: Partial sums of A019444. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 17 2019
results.author: _R. K. Guy_, Tom Halverson (halverson(AT)macalester.edu)
